info.title: Inventarix API Documentation
info.description: Inventarix is an inventory management system designed to help organizations efficiently manage items, track transactions, and control user access. The API provides structured endpoints for authentication, category and item management, staff administration, transaction tracking, and personal user settings.

post.summary: Authenticates a admin using email and password. Returns an access token on success
Authenticates a staff using email and password. Returns an access token on success

delete.summary: Logs out the currently authenticated admin and revokes their token.
Logs out the currently authenticated staff and revokes their token.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all item categories.
Retrieves a paginated list of item categories.
Retrieves details of a specific category by ID.
Retrieves a paginated list of item items.

post.summary: Adds a new item to the inventory.

get.summary: Retrieves details of a specific item by ID.

put.summary: Updates information for a specific item.

delete.summary: Removes an item from the inventory.

get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of item staff.
Retrieves details of a specific staff member.

put.summary: Updates the information of a specific staff member.

delete.summary: Removes a staff member from the system.

get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of item transactions.

post.summary: Creates a new transaction (e.g., in or out items)

get.summary: Retrieves details of a specific transaction.
